name: SET SPECIAL FILE NUMBER
description: This is a TAS Professional 3.0 command here for compatibility. The preferred method is to use the OPENV/FINDV commands.

parameters.name: non_TAS_file_num
parameters.description: This is the number of the non-TAS file opened with the OPNO command. This must resolve to a value of 1 through 3. The files are numbered in the order they are opened.

comments: This is the equivalent of the TAS Professional 3.0 command Set Special File Num.
